activity.text: Excited to announce RoboDesk, a multi-task, pixel-based reinforcement learning benchmark that features 9 diverse tasks in the same environment. The tasks test for a wide variety of robotic skills and involve multiple interactive objects (drawers, buttons, various blocks). ðŸ¤–ðŸ‘‡ https://t.co/PCAXAaT5EO

RoboDesk comes as a self-contained Python package with few dependencies. The source code is clean and pragmatic, making it a useful blueprint for creating new MuJoCo environments.

pip install robodesk

More info: https://t.co/tisnSTF0iL

(cc @danijarh @chelseabfinn @doomie)

replyTo.text: We carefully designed and tested RoboDesk to ensure fast and stable physics simulation. This avoids objects from intersecting, getting stuck, or quickly flying away, common problems that can occur with multi-object environments.

activity.text:
Exciting news today - Reverie has raised a $25M Series A! I'm immensely grateful and proud of the incredible team that got us here, and so excited for what lies ahead in our journey to cure diseases with computation. 

https://t.co/3Mh9QqETvp
@GuptaAnkitV Congrats!! So exciting :)
